X1 = HEAD LENGTH FIRST SON
X2 = HEAD BREADTH FIRST SON
X3 = HEAD LENGTH SECOND SON
X4 = HEAD BREADTH SECOND SON


```{r}
data = read.csv("C:/Users/statlab/Desktop/RUPESH PANDEY/Sem-2/Multivariate Analysis-2/MA-2 Practical/practical-4 Brother's  Data.csv")
head(data)

y = matrix(c(rep(1)),25,1)
y

## mean

x = as.matrix(data)
x

n = 25

x_bar = t(x)%*%y/n
x_bar

## sigma

s = cov(data)
s

p = 2
p

v11 = s[1:2,1:2]
v12 = s[1:2,3:4]
v21 = s[3:4,1:2]
v22 = s[3:4,3:4]

v11
v12
v21
v22

x1_bar = x_bar[1:2]
x2_bar = x_bar[3:4]

x1_bar
x2_bar

hotelling = n*(n-1)* t(x1_bar - x2_bar)%*%solve(v11-v12-v21+v22)%*%(x1_bar-x2_bar)
hotelling

hotelling_tab = ((n-p)/p)*(hotelling/n-1)
hotelling_tab

ftab = qf(0.95,p,n-p)
ftab

## REJECT HO AS WE CALCULATED VALUE IS GREATER THAN TABULATED VALUE AT 5% LOS.


```
